event.name: Large Group
event.subtitle: Winter 2016
event.description:
Drexel Students for Christ seeks to build community. One of the ways we do that is through our weekly Large Group meetings where we worship our Savior and hear His word, as delivered by a local pastor.
This week, Gavin Lymberopoulos will be kicking off our new series on Matthew with Matthew 3.

description.p: Drexel Students for Christ seeks to build community. One of the ways we do that is through our weekly Large Group meetings where we worship our Savior and hear His word, as delivered by a local pastor.
This week, Gavin Lymberopoulos will be kicking off our new series on Matthew with Matthew 3.
